description: Welcome to Mitchell by Mosaic on Burke Mountain! This rare 2-level townhome offers 4 spacious bedrooms upstairs and 3 bathrooms, designed with families in mind. Main floor boasts soaring 10’ ceilings, open-concept layout, and a gourmet kitchen with a large island, sleek cabinetry, and plenty of storage. The primary suite features a spa-inspired ensuite and an impressive 13’ walk-in closet. 3 additional bedrooms on the same level provide comfort and flexibility for kids, guests, or a home office. Enjoy your private outdoor patio, perfect for relaxing or entertaining. Just a 5-minute walk to the future Burke Mountain Village, with trails, parks, and schools nearby, this home offers the perfect blend of style, function, and convenience. Don’t miss this opportunity!
